Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2011 06:01PM vjcrocker wrote: I also know how you feel.  I do research and of course you read alot of not so good stuff.  I'm 46 and not ready to go and the research saids 3-10 years on average.  That just sucks.  But I keep my chin up and I am going to keep fighting.  I know there are those that dont even have that long but sometimes you just have to get it out.  God Bless all my fellow Survivors.
